```
import struct

data = bytes.fromhex('')

print(len(data))

# response_struct = struct.Struct("=BBBHL32sBB")
response_struct = struct.Struct("=BBBHL32sB284s")

print(response_struct.size)

(
    cmd,
    sub,
    sub2,
    device_type,
    device_id,
    device_name,
    tz,
    unused,

    # firmware_info,
    # network,
    # wifi,
    # soft_ap_wifi,
    # harware_info,
) = response_struct.unpack(data)

device_name = device_name.decode("utf-8").split("\x00")[0]
device_id_str = "%4X" % device_id

print("Device")
print(device_type)
print(device_id)
print(device_id_str)
print(device_name)
print(f"tz={tz}")
print(unused)
```
